name: Elegant Subscription Popup
author: Shrinivas Naik

sections.description:
Elegant Subscription Popup is the most popular lead capturing wordpress plugin (7000+ downloads) that helps to convert your visitors to subscribers, this plugin supports Feedburner, Mailpoet and many other newsletters.

Elegant subscription popup plugin shows an animated feedburner form when site gets loaded. It doesn’t annoy the visitor to subscribe repeatedly instead it shows the feedburner subscription form with the interval of days set by admin.

Elegant subscription popup is responsive therefore it adjusts itself with PC, tablet and mobile devices.

Here are some cool features of Elegant Subscription Popup plugin

  • Cool animation effect on load and exit
  • Doesn’t annoy your blog reader
  • Add your own logo image
  • Clean and elegant look
  • Responsive design
  • Easy to use admin panel

Upgrade to Pro and get the following features

  • Add other newsletter subscription instead of Feedburner such as MailPoet using shortcode
  • WYSIWYG editor to enter your message in the backend with media upload Button
  • Optimized for MailPoet newsletter
  • Delayed popup option
  • Change popup content and heading font size
  • Change popup background color
  • Change popup text color
  • Change popup width

Get the Pro Version Now!

Check out the subscription form plugin demo

Checkout Our other WordPress Plugins

  • Stylish Notification Popup
  • Fluid Notification Bar
  • Simple Adblock Notice

  • Multi Device Website Mockup Generator
  • HTML List Generator

Plugin by TechSini

Credits
* Animate.css
* Google Fonts
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.7.3

  • Important update
  • Removed optional backlink
  • Added admin notice

1.7.2

  • Minor tweaks in plugin setting page
  • Compatible with WordPress 4.7

1.7.1

  • Stability improvements
  • Fixed some CSS for mobile
  • Customization options are now available in pro

1.7

  • Improved cookie handling so now no conflicts for using this plugin on multiple wordpress websites
  • Automatically closes after submitting the feedburner form
  • Added Popup Font Size option
  • Added Popop Text color option
  • Loaded Google fonts over https protocol
  • Optimized close button

1.6

  • Fixed a critical conflict with image upload (It is highly recomended to update the plugin to the latest version)

1.5

  • Added logo image option to set your own logo on Elegant subscription popup
  • Added 1 day option for “Show Every X Day(s)” option
  • Fixed some bugs

1.4

  • Added delayed popup display option in the backend
  • Added animated placeholder text for email input box

1.3

  • Added popup title and description input boxes in settings, now you can change the popup title and description from settings panel
  • You can change the popup color
  • Fixed some bugs

1.2

  • Fixed some minor bugs

1.1

  • Fixed PHP warnings

1.0

  • Initial release of Elegant subscription popup plugin
